pages.text: $(li)Wither Skeletons are a variant of the common Skeletons that can be found in the Nether Fortresses of the Nether.$(br)$(li)When they hit you, they will inflict you the Wither effect, reducing your life every two seconds as the Poison, but this one can kill you.
They may drop Bones, Coal, rarely Emeralds and very rarely a Wither Skeletons Skull on death.

$(li)Tiny Wither Skeletons are a cute variant of the Wither Skeletons and they can be found very rarely in the Nether Fortresses.$(br)$(li)When you are close of one of them, it will run quickly for you.$(br)$(li)They may drop Bones, Coal and always one Wither Skeleton Skull on death.
